assignments.description: Assigns the Member Account ID to an Unassigned Membership
assignments.name: Assign_Membership_Record
assignments.label: Assign - Membership Record

assignments.description: Copies the unassigned memebrship collection to be used to filter out the Accounts that will be assigned in the next loop
assignments.name: Assign_Unassigned_Membership_Collection
assignments.label: Assign - Unassigned Membership Collection

collectionProcessors.description: Gets the first record of the Unassigned membership collection to assign it to a member
collectionProcessors.name: Sort_Unassigned_Memberships_Collection
collectionProcessors.label: Sort - Unassigned Memberships Collection

collectionProcessors.description: Sorts the unassigned membership collection copy by created date to match the sorting of the initial collection
collectionProcessors.name: Sort_Unassigned_Memership_Collection_Copy
collectionProcessors.label: Sort - Unassigned Memership Collection Copy

Flow.description:
Enable users to view available memberships, select a membership type, and assign memberships to team members without existing memberships.
V10 - update Individual Assignment to set Assigned ID to be Account and not Membership
Flow.label: Assign Memberships Flow

loops.description: Loops through the Unassigned Membership Collection to complete the Assignement. A Loop is used inside the loop as a workaround and it shouldn't have any implications since the collection is sorted to only return 1 record.
loops.name: Loop_Unassigned_Membership_Collection
loops.label: Loop - Unassigned Membership Collection

recordUpdates.description: Updates the Individual Membership Assignmets with the Assigned Account
recordUpdates.name: Update_Individual_Memership_Assignments
recordUpdates.label: Update - Individual Memership Assignments

fields.name: SelectMembership
fields.fieldText: Please select the membership below that you would like to assign to a member.

fields.name: displayText_Completion
fields.fieldText: The memberships have been correctly assigned to the selected users.

fields.name: displayText_NoMemberships
fields.fieldText:
You have no available memberships for assignment.


Click [link] to purchase more memberships.

fields.name: displayText_NotEnoughMemberships
fields.fieldText: You selected {!var_CountSelectedUsers} members but only have {!var_NumberAvailableMemberships} available to assign. Please select an appropriate amount of memberships to assign.

fields.name: displayText_PracticeMembers_0
fields.fieldText:
All assignments are set to Full-Time employments by default. Any assignments that need to be changed from Full-Time, you can edit here.


If you don't edit them here, you will be able to edit them when viewing their Membership information on your Manage My Team page.

fields.name: displayText_PracticeMembers
fields.fieldText: Please select which members you would like to assign the selected Practice Membership to.

fields.name: displayText_UpdatedEmploymentType
fields.fieldText: You have successfully updated the Employment Type for the edited membership assignments.

fields.name: SelectMember
fields.fieldText:
Choose the members below whom you wish to assign the {!datatable_AllMemberships.outputSelectedRow.Name} Membership!


You have {!var_NumberAvailableMemberships} to be assigned.
